title: Israel says half of Hamas military leadership killed since Oct. 7
content: The announcement, which The Washington Post could not independently verify, came as local health authorities said 60 people were killed in strikes across Gaza.
summary: The announcement, which The Washington Post could not independently verify, came as local health authorities said 60 people were killed in strikes across Gaza.

title: 2 Americans among 6 dead found in Bangkok hotel room, officials say
content: An initial investigation indicates they were killed, say police, who found a spread of room service including fully consumed beverages and untouched food.
summary: An initial investigation indicates they were killed, say police, who found a spread of room service including fully consumed beverages and untouched food.

title: Russia convicts writer Masha Gessen; reporter Gershkovich seeks faster trial
content: In two politicized cases, Gessen, a Russian-born writer, is convicted of spreading fake news while Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich is charged with espionage.
summary: In two politicized cases, Gessen, a Russian-born writer, is convicted of spreading fake news while Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich is charged with espionage.

title: ‘Long live Donald Trump’: Indians express their support after shooting
content: For many leaders and supporters of India’s ruling BJP, the struggles of Donald Trump mirror their own battles against the opposition.
summary: For many leaders and supporters of India’s ruling BJP, the struggles of Donald Trump mirror their own battles against the opposition.

title: Across river from lavish Indian wedding, frustration and flooded streets
content: The extravagant nuptials of Anant Ambani were a national Rorschach test: awe-inspiring showcase of Indian affluence or indictment of lopsided development?
summary: The extravagant nuptials of Anant Ambani were a national Rorschach test: awe-inspiring showcase of Indian affluence or indictment of lopsided development?

title: Housing, once the ticket to wealth in China, is now draining fortunes
content: Communist Party officials are meeting this week to try to stabilize the slowing Chinese economy. But they’re not tackling the biggest problem: the property crisis.
summary: Communist Party officials are meeting this week to try to stabilize the slowing Chinese economy. But they’re not tackling the biggest problem: the property crisis.

title: Gambia keeps ban on female genital cutting after fears it would be repealed
content: The decision by the National Assembly follows nearly a year of heated debate in this West African nation.
summary: The decision by the National Assembly follows nearly a year of heated debate in this West African nation.

title: World leaders react to Trump rally shooting: ‘A tragedy for our democracies’
content: Leaders from France, Canada, India, China and elsewhere condemned political violence and sent well-wishes to the former president.
summary: Leaders from France, Canada, India, China and elsewhere condemned political violence and sent well-wishes to the former president.

title: Biden made a bold deal with Venezuela’s strongman. Will it pay off?
content: The United States suspended crippling sanctions on the authoritarian government of Nicolás Maduro in exchange for Maduro’s promise of a free and fair election.
summary: The United States suspended crippling sanctions on the authoritarian government of Nicolás Maduro in exchange for Maduro’s promise of a free and fair election.

title: Israel’s military, worn down by Gaza, looks warily toward war in Lebanon
content: As Israel trades threats with Hezbollah, there are fears that the military is overstretched and its resources depleted after nine months of war against Hamas.
summary: As Israel trades threats with Hezbollah, there are fears that the military is overstretched and its resources depleted after nine months of war against Hamas.

title: Two earlier assassination attempts shadow Trump shooting
content: Two earlier, instructive precedents suggest that our politics are unlikely to calm down in the wake of the Trump assassination attempt.
summary: Two earlier, instructive precedents suggest that our politics are unlikely to calm down in the wake of the Trump assassination attempt.

title: Asia’s richest man is hosting a ‘spectacular,’ ‘vulgar,’ star-studded wedding
content: Anant Ambani, Mukesh Ambani’s son, has married Radhika Merchant. Here’s what to know about the glitzy, glamorous and controversial wedding in Mumbai.
summary: Anant Ambani, Mukesh Ambani’s son, has married Radhika Merchant. Here’s what to know about the glitzy, glamorous and controversial wedding in Mumbai.
